column2: i prefer Lou pizza to the competition (matter of opinion).  As for this place specifically
column3: it is very popular being in the city and as such
column5: the service is very good. If you can
column6: grab a spot at the bar
column7: order an appetizer and drink and youre good to go on your wait.  Otherwise
column8: itll be standing either outside in the "grazing area" or inside.
